content: @nikomatsakis has declared bankruptcy on their Github and Zulip notifications. As such, I'm looking for somebody on the lang team to review https://github.com/rust-lang/reference/pull/888 and https://github.com/rust-lang/reference/pull/915 which document how a few expressions evaluate their operands specifically and how the rest do it generally.
@isHavvy I'll take a look :)
